com.paydiant.android.core.util

Class EncryptionStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paydiant.android.core.util.EncryptionStrategy

  • public class EncryptionStrategy
extends Object
    The Encryption strategy class which provides a set of util methods for encrypting data.
    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.

    • Method Detail

      • hash

        public static String hash(String data,
          String algorithmType)
        The method would take a data value as a String and encrypt it using the specified algorithm type. If the algorithm type is not supported PaydiantClientException is thrown with appropriate error code.
        Parameters:
        data - - The data to be encrypted as a String
        algorithmType - - The algorithm type or the algorithm to be applied on the data.
        Returns:
        return the encrypted data as a String.

      • encrypt

        @Deprecated
public static String encrypt(String seed,
                        String cleartext,
                        String encryptionAlgorithm)
        Deprecated. Use of predefined seed is insecure. Use encrypt(String) instead.
        The public method to encrypt a plain string using a given seed for generating a key and a specified algorithm.
        Parameters:
        seed - Seed used to generate the Key
        cleartext - The plain text input
        encryptionAlgorithm - The algorithm used to encrypt i.e. AES
        Returns:
        String The encrypted message

      • decrypt

        @Deprecated
public static String decrypt(String seed,
                        String encrypted,
                        String decryptionAlgorithm)
        Deprecated. Use of predefined seed is insecure. Use decrypt(String) instead.
        The public method to decrypt an encrypted string using a given seed for generating a key and a specified algorithm.
        Parameters:
        seed - Seed used to generate the Key
        encrypted - The encrypted message input
        decryptionAlgorithm - The algorithm used to encrypt i.e. AES
        Returns:
        String The decrypted message

      • encrypt

        public static String encrypt(String cleartext)
        Encrypts the clear text using AES.
        Parameters:
        cleartext - - String to extracted.
        Returns:
        encrypted value as a String
        Since:
        5.8.0.1

      • decrypt

        public static String decrypt(String encrypted)
        Decrypts a String encrypted using encrypt(String).
        Parameters:
        encrypted - - encrypted String value.
        Returns:
        decrypted String
        Since:
        5.8.0.1
